item.title: Detox Your Life
item.description: We live in a consumer driven age, in a consumer driven world. Everything needs to be quick and easy, and if itâ€™s not, we are not interested. So we do the same with our health. A 3-day detox, or a 2 week diet. We do not realise how much damage the diet culture is doing to our health. We came to a point where people are willing to damage their health just to be thin…
